main event: Observers reported seeing a star-like object that changed colors over 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10-15 minutes,The object changed colors every 15-20 seconds,One witness compared the object to the star Capella,The object remained stationary during the observation, The sky was clear at the time of the sighting.
location: Center Moriches, Long Island, New York
